title: on me by section 1(4) of the Family Leave and Miscellaneous Provisions Act
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Family Leave and Miscellaneous
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Family Leave and Miscellaneous 

Provisions Act 2021 (Part 9) (Commencement) Order 2021.
text_norm: 1 order may cited family leave miscellaneous provision act 2021 (part 9) (commencement) order 2021

title: on me by section 1(4) of the Family Leave and Miscellaneous Provisions Act
heading: 2. The 24th day of April 2021 is appointed as the day on which Part 9 of the
text_raw:
2. The 24th day of April 2021 is appointed as the day on which Part 9 of the 
Family Leave and Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2021 (No. 4 of 2021) shall 
come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

15 April, 2021. 

HELEN MCENTEE, 
Minister for Justice. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 20th April, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [180] 3

title: on me by section 1(4) of the Family Leave and Miscellaneous Provisions Act
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Order appoints 24 April 2021 as the day on which Part 9 of the Family 
Leave and Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2021 (No. 4 of 2021) comes into 
operation. Part 9 of the Act deals with amendments to the Judicial Council Act 
2019 and the Personal Injuries Assessment Board Act 2003 to make provision 
in relation to the operation of personal injuries guidelines adopted by the Judicial 
Council. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [180]
